alert.note: Alert for Bailey; Castro; Lamb; Parmer; Swisher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 15 at 11:49PM CDT until September 16 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BAILEY...SOUTHEASTERN PARMER...SOUTHERN CASTRO... SOUTHWESTERN SWISHER AND NORTHWESTERN LAMB COUNTIES... At 1149 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles east of Lazbuddie, or 9 miles northwest of Earth, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hart, Earth, Lazbuddie, and Springlake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
